title: Tin - leading companies worldwide based on production output 2017
yAxis: Production output in thousand metric tons
summary: This is a bar chart representing Largest Tin Producers in the x axis and Production output in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The Production output in thousand metric tons is highest at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and lowest at Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
There is a difference of 65.8 between the maximum Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and minimum Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Largest Tin Producers, and Production output in thousand metric tons in each Largest Tin Producers on the y axis.
Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) has the highest Production output in thousand metric tons and Gejiu Zi-Li (China) has the lowest Production output in thousand metric tons.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Largest Tin Producers in the x axis and Production output in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The Production output in thousand metric tons is highest at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and lowest at Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
There is a difference of 65.8 between the maximum Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and minimum Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Largest Tin Producers in the x axis and Production output in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The Production output in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and lowest at Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
The lowest value at Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China) is 8.56x times less than the highest value at Yunnan Tin (China).

Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) is higher than any other Largest Tin Producerss with value 74.5, followed by PT Timah (Indonesia), and Malaysia Smelting Corporation (Malaysia). Down to Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China) with the lowest value 8.7.
The highest value 74.5 at Yunnan Tin (China) is almost 3.24 times larger than the average value 22.98.
